thread.section_title: Airwise - The Airport and Air Travel Guide
thread.title: Air Travel Growth Slows In June - IATA
thread.title_full: Air Travel Growth Slows In June - IATA | Airwise News

author: Reuters
title: Air Travel Growth Slows In June - IATA
text:
Global demand for air travel continued to rise in June, albeit at a slower rate as weakness in Asia-Pacific and the impact of the Greek debt crisis were felt. Air passenger traffic in terms of revenue passenger kilometres rose 5.7 percent in June, against a 6.9 percent increase recorded for May, IATA said in its monthly passenger data release.
IATA said the June figures were also affected by the timing of Ramadan, which depressed travel demand in the Middle East.
(Reuters)
